info:
States:
 - needsInit -> initializing (btn)
 - initializing -> ready (plc)
 - ready -> markerNotDetected/positioningXY (btn)
 - markerNotDetected -> ready (btn-dly)
 - positioningXY -> positioningZ (plc)
 - positioningZ -> charging (plc)
 - charging -> homingZ (btn)
 - homingZ -> homingXY (plc)
 - homingXY -> ready (plc)
